directions: In a large bowl, mix together the macaroni, cheese, onion, green bell pepper, corned beef, soup, milk and peas.
Place this in a lightly greased 9x13 inch baking dish and refrigerate overnight.
Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
Allow dish to come up to room temperature.
Bake in preheated oven for 1 hour.
ingredients: 2 (10.75 ounce) cans  condensed cream of chicken soup
title: Corned Beef Casserole
